entry.title: Friday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Near blizzard changing to periods of snow late this evening and ending before morning then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023
